abstract: Another blow to dozens of businesses on the Jersey Shore. Updates on the looming financial crises. And a Home Depot wedding proposal.
snippet: Another blow to dozens of businesses on the Jersey Shore. Updates on the looming financial crises. And a Home Depot wedding proposal.
lead_paragraph: What’s affecting me, my clients and other small-business owners today.

headline.main: Today in Small Business: Frauds and Cyberattacks
